title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.7 - Prohibition against payment of compensation to unlicensed bail agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.7 - Prohibition against payment of compensation to unlicensed bail agents

State Regulations

No insurer or charitable bail organization, and no officer, bail agent or other representative thereof, shall pay any commission or other compensation to any person, firm, corporation, or other entity for or because of his, her, or its acting as a bail agent in this State, except to a licensed bail agent appointed by the insurer or charitable bail organization. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
